resources.string: Enter an amount less than or equal to your available balance
Estimate based on the most recent conversion rate, including our currency conversion fee.
Link a bank account so you can send money, issue refunds, and transfer money from PayPal to your bank.
Unable to access your balance information.
Why is my money on hold?
Link a bank account at PayPal.com so you can send money, issue refunds, and transfer money from PayPal to your bank.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours. Would you still like to continue with your transfer?
You\'re transferring money to your bank using your %1$s
This should take just a few minutes. We’ll keep you updated on your transfer to %1$s
Transfers may take a few minutes and vary by bank. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
This will be converted to about %1$s
This rate includes our conversion fee.
Transfers can take up to 5 days.
Estimated arrival: 1 business day\nTransfers made after 7:00 PM ET or on weekends or holidays take longer. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.

You\'ll typically see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card.\n\nThere’s a %1$s fee. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Transfers may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.

You\'ll typically see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card.\n\nThere’s a %1$s fee. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Transfers may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.
Link an eligible debit card or bank
Transfers may take up to %1$s and vary by bank. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Transfers made after 7:00 PM ET or on weekends or holidays take longer. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Amount is more than the possible %1$s maximum.
You\'ve transferred the maximum amount allowed using this card.
Don\'t see all of your banks and cards?
Certain banks and card issuers are not supported.
Because transfer times vary by bank, some transfers may take up to %1$d %2$s
Your transfer will be delayed, would you still like to continue with your transfer?
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours. You won\'t be charged the fee.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours.
You transferred money to your bank using your %1$s
The money remains in your PayPal balance.

For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours, but we\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. You won\'t be charged the fee. Or you can cancel your transfer.
Sorry, we weren\'t able to process your transaction. Check that you\'re connected to a network and try again.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours, but we\'ll email you as soon as we have an update.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours, but we\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. You won\'t be charged the fee.
Sorry, we weren\'t able to cancel your funds transfer. Your transaction is still pending.
We\'ll update you on your %1$s transfer within 30 minutes
You requested a transfer to your bank using your %1$s
Looks like something went\nwrong on our end
We successfully confirmed your information and you can continue to maintain a PayPal balance. You can send it, spend it, or just keep it as a cushion against the unexpected.
You\'ll still be able to transfer money from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
You\'ll still be able to transfer money from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
You\'ll still be able to transfer money from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
We\'ll send an email as soon as we\'re done reviewing your docs. This usually takes 2-3 business days.\n\nWhile you\'re waiting you can always transfer the money to your bank.
In order to transfer a partial amount we need to confirm your identity
If you want to use your remaining PayPal balance to send or spend after this transfer, we\'ll need a bit more information to confirm your identity.
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your transfer is temporarily pending while we review it.
Because your transfer is delayed, you won\'t be charged the %1$s.
Right now, we\'re not able to complete this transaction.
You haven\'t confirmed your identity yet

Would you like to continue and confirm your identity now? If you skip this step, you can transfer money from PayPal to your linked account, but you won\'t be able to use your PayPal balance to send or spend money.
What do you want to do with the %1$s?
Move the money to your bank in minutes for a small fee. Or direct to your bank for free.
Let\'s set you up with a PayPal Cash account so you can send or spend right from PayPal.
Sorry, we weren\'t able to create your PayPal Cash account at this time. Transfer the money to your bank, instead.
%1$s is now available in your new PayPal Cash account.
When friends send you money or you sell something, you\'ll see it on your home screen.
Looks like something went wrong on our end. \nPlease try again.
We\'re still reviewing your information. We\'ll let you know as soon as we\'re done.
